archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Create Port In Request
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: The Create Port In Request is responsible for receiving and process Port In requests issued by customer orders.

properties.value: The Create Port In Request is responsible for receiving and process Port In requests issued by customer orders. The process allows a customer to come up with his/her number from a third CSP.
